scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to infer sensitive customer data (e.g., income, address) from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker crafts specific inputs to the model and analyzes the outputs to reconstruct sensitive features.
initial_goal: Evaluate the robustness of the customer churn prediction model against adversarial attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking - specifically, a bank's customer relationship management system (CRM) using a machine learning model to predict customer churn
